name: The Stone
summary: You will play the role of Jake, the hero of the story, falling in love with Aurora, daughter of the President. You will explore VR style designed science fiction world of Galactic Federation and the spiritual world of "Pioneer" of ancient world. You will equip with different set of weapons, using gesture recognition to turn on the shield system, releasing the "blink" skill. These skills can be used for different fierce fighting mission, challenging various brutal enemies.
